section.title: Recover Start-up Processes
section.para: In this disaster scenario, you expect processes to start, but they do not. If those processes are not running, ansible start-up scripts will fail. On the deployer, use ansible to check status on the control plane servers. The following checks and remedies address common causes of this condition.

listitem.para: If disk space is low, determine its cause and remove anything that is no longer needed. Check disk space with the following command:
Check Network Time Protocol (NTP) with the following command.

listitem.screen: &prompt.ardana;ansible KEY-API -i hosts/verb_hosts \ -m shell -a "sudo systemctl status keepalived | head -8"

&prompt.ardana;ansible KEY-API -i hosts/verb_hosts \ -m shell -a "sudo systemctl restart keepalived "
